A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Wow. The audience isn't lying. The Last Jedi is worse than The Last Airbender. This movie is not only one of the worst movies I've ever seen\, it commits heresies and crimes against the original trilogy. 

Many reviewers have rightfully concluded that this movie is vandalism. The biggest mistake Disney made was attempting to vandalize Luke Skywalker's legacy. 

Many reviewers have also concluded that this is NOT a REAL Star Wars sequel\, and they are right. This is not what George Lucas had planned for Luke Skywalker. This movie will never be accepted as "canon" by true fans of the original three movies.
